item.author: qtopie.rw@gmail.com (qtopierw)
item.description: Vimscript https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vim_(text_editor)#Vim_script :h write-plugin channel demoserver.py https://github.com/vim/vim/blob/master/runtime/tools/demoserver.py https://github.com/vim/vim/blob/master/src/testdir/test_channel_pipe.py https://vimhelp.org/channel.txt.html#job-start 目录结构 ~/.vim/colors/ define color schemes used by Vim. ~/.vim/plugin/ are run each time Vim starts. ~/.vim/ftdetect/ are run each time Vim starts. Files here are used for filetype detection derived by autocommands. ~/.vim/ftplugin/ are run when the buffer filetype is set; Vim looks in this directory for a subdirectory name matching the buffer filetype (for example: ~/.vim/ftplugin/java/ for .java files.
